_header: I shall please my lord by working
_description: A 29-line verse mnemonic for the incipits of the Officium pro Mortuis

OxfMert68.First Lines:
I shall please my lorde by worchyngin the Regioun of them þat
                    be lyvyng…
OxfMert68.Last Lines:
…Lord I enqwere in my though of my moder wombe why hast thou
                    me brought
